title: ISic001681. I.Sicily inscription 001681
body:
Facsimile Images

1[......]ΤΩΝΕΓΕΣΤΑ[...]
2[---.]ΡΤΕΜΩΝΟΣΝ[---]
3[....].ΥΤΕΡΟΝΑΡΕΤΑ[........]

Apparatus criticus

Text of I.Segesta

English translation

The people of the Segestans (dedicate this statue of) [---] N[---] the elder, son of Artemon, on account of his excellence

Italian translation

Il popolo dei Segestani (ha onorato/ha eretto la statua di) [---] senior, figlio di Artemon, N[---], per il suo valore [transl. from I.Segesta]

commentary

bibliography

  • Ampolo and Erdas 2019 G5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001036
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence

Italian translation
